mods.abstract: Page 82 of the album includes two photographs.; Photograph 1 [143] shows a wooden barn interior with corn stalks stored on the second story loft.; Photograph 2 [161] shows several crop stacks set out to dry across a field. Men and women work the field in the distance.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
